results.question: What is the refund policy?
results.answer:
# Refund Policy
Customers can request a refund within 30 days of delivery.
Refunds are issued to the original payment method within 5-10 business days after approval.
Items must be unused and in original packaging.

# Shipping Policy
Standard shipping: 3-7 business days.
Expedited shipping: 1-3 business days.
Orders over $50 qualify for free standard shipping.
